member.name: T:StockSharp.OpenECry.OpenECryStopTypes
member.summary: The type of the conditional order OpenECry.

member.name: F:StockSharp.OpenECry.OpenECryStopTypes.StopMarket
member.summary: The market order is automatically registered after reaching the stop price.

member.name: F:StockSharp.OpenECry.OpenECryStopTypes.StopLimit
member.summary: The limit order is automatically registered after reaching the stop price.

member.name: F:StockSharp.OpenECry.OpenECryStopTypes.TrailingStopMarket
member.summary: Stop price automatically follows the market, but only in a profitable direction for position, staying on specified in advance interval from market price. If the market reaches the stop price, the market order is automatically registered.

member.name: F:StockSharp.OpenECry.OpenECryStopTypes.TrailingStopLimit
member.summary: As , but when it reaches the stop price the limit order is registered.

member.name: F:StockSharp.OpenECry.OpenECryStopTypes.MarketOnClose
member.summary: To match at the market price, if the closing price is higher than the expected price.

member.name: F:StockSharp.OpenECry.OpenECryStopTypes.MarketIfTouched
member.summary: With the market price when the condition is fulfilled.

member.name: F:StockSharp.OpenECry.OpenECryStopTypes.MarketOnOpen
member.summary: At trading opening.
